pages.text: Right click to store xp and sneak right click to retrieve xp. Pressing 'V' (By default) will turn on auto collection

Collects xp in a 16 block radius when activated. Shift Right-Click while holding it to activate/deactivate it. Right click it to change mods. Absorbtion mode will consume your experience and extraction mod will feed you it's xp.
Is configurable in the GUI, can store collected xp into a tank if you have the upgrade equipped on your backpack. Has different options like stocking your xp up to a specific level.
